submission:
HC='hc'
VC='vc'
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        hdone=set()
        cdone=set()
        costs=[]
        for i,cost in enumerate(horizontalCut):
            costs.append((cost,i,HC))
        for i,cost in enumerate(verticalCut):
            costs.append((cost,i,VC))
        costs.sort(reverse=True)
        # print(costs)
        res=0
        for cost,i,d in costs:
            cutary=horizontalCut if d==HC else verticalCut
            thisdone=cdone if d==VC else hdone
            oppdone=cdone if d==HC else hdone
            res+=cost*(len(oppdone)+1)
            thisdone.add(i)
        return res
